code: import{v4 as uuidv4}from'uuid';import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'./types';export var setAlert=function setAlert(msg,alertType){return function(dispatch){var id=uuidv4();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,payload:{msg:msg,alertType:alertType,id:id}});setTimeout(function(){return dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT,payload:id});},5000);};};
